attributes.action: Support the English/Scottish FA in overturning FIFA's decision to ban the POPPY
attributes.background: Please support the Scottish and English FA in ensuring that FIFA will not be aloud to ban the POPPY which is due to be worn on the shirts of both teams on November 11th at Wembley. In no way could the rememberance POPPY be regarded as the kind of political, commercial or religious symbol. Stand up.
